DESCRIPTION: Githurai-lang'ata  health facility  is located in Kiambu county in kenya.It is the first CLC site developed for proof of concept. It is a level 3 health facility that provides curative, immunization, antenatal, maternity and postnatal services, HIV and TB services, laboratory and ultrasound services. It also include community health services, provides water through a borehole and solar lighting.The objective of this project was to develop and test the CLC concept.The partners in this project include:- Philips and the county government of Kiambu.The project started  in: June, 2014, as an Exploration project.
